Title: Relates to requiring private food service companies to disclose ingredient lists and nutritional information for all meals they provide school districts and requiring districts to publish this information online
Summary: Requires all contracts with private food service management companies to disclose ingredient lists and nutritional information for all the meals they provide school districts and requires such school districts to publish such ingredient lists and nutritional information on their district's website.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring private food service management companies to disclose ingredient lists and nutritional information for all the meals they provide school districts and requiring such school districts to publish this information on their website
